content.prompt:
Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices, choose the most appropriate remark that the ﬁrst speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker.

NOW GET READY FOR THE BRIEF EXCHANGE:

choices.label: Nein, dafür haben wir nicht genug Zeit.
Ach so, dann haben wir ja schon etwas.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
